product_name: Nitecore CG6 Multicolor LED Flashlight - White/Green - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Switching effortlessly between a superbright 440-lumen white LED and 120-lumen green LED, this pocket-size flashlight tackles campsites, night hikes and map reading with the simple press of a button.
short_description: Switching effortlessly between a superbright 440-lumen white LED and 120-lumen green LED, this pocket-size flashlight tackles campsites, night hikes and map reading with the simple press of a button.
